description:
Get ready to chic things up...Emily in Paris Season 4: Part 1 premiering on August 15 followed by Part 2 on September 12; only on Netflix.

Watch Emily in Paris, only on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/emilyinparis

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 270 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Emily in Paris: Season 4 Part 1 | Official Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

Emily's life in Paris may have beaucoup drama, but she's ready to make bold choices to get everything she wants from the city — and man — of her dreams.
title: Emily in Paris Season 4 Part 1  Official Trailer  Netflix
captions:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,461
Oh my God, Mindy. You know what I saw on my run?

2
00:00:02,544 --> 00:00:04,880
Hot men. Everywhere.

3
00:00:04,963 --> 00:00:07,216
I guess I've been so focused on Gabriel and Alfie

4
00:00:07,299 --> 00:00:10,511
that I forgot what it feels like to be single.

5
00:00:10,594 --> 00:00:12,763
And now that I'm not with either of them--

6
00:00:12,846 --> 00:00:13,847
You're not with Alfie?

7
00:00:16,808 --> 00:00:19,520
It's finally opened up a nice little path for you

8
00:00:19,603 --> 00:00:20,979
to be with Gabriel.

9
00:00:22,397 --> 00:00:24,024
The man that is still having a baby

10
00:00:24,107 --> 00:00:25,859
with a woman who's in love with another woman,

11
00:00:25,943 --> 00:00:27,319
and I'm the only one that knows?

12
00:00:27,402 --> 00:00:29,446
Well, no relationship is perfect.

13
00:00:29,530 --> 00:00:30,447
Seriously?

14
00:00:32,407 --> 00:00:34,451
The breakup is all over the internet.

15
00:00:34,535 --> 00:00:37,246
You broadcast your entire life for public consumption.

16
00:00:37,329 --> 00:00:38,789
Now it's affecting my business.

17
00:00:38,872 --> 00:00:42,292
Who could imagine things would balloon the way they did?

18
00:00:42,376 --> 00:00:43,460
Fix this.

19
00:00:44,002 --> 00:00:45,254
Alfie, we need to talk.

20
00:00:45,337 --> 00:00:46,547
Oh my God!

21
00:00:46,630 --> 00:00:48,799
Can we please just talk about what happened?

22
00:00:48,882 --> 00:00:50,300
I just need some more time.

23
00:00:50,384 --> 00:00:52,427
Wine. Great timing.

24
00:00:53,011 --> 00:00:53,845
Cheers.

25
00:00:56,139 --> 00:01:00,185
Emily, you have interfered with me for the last time.

26
00:01:01,270 --> 00:01:03,605
I accept responsibility for things,

27
00:01:03,689 --> 00:01:04,982
unlike you.

28
00:01:05,065 --> 00:01:07,276
-I'm so sick of the secrets. -So am I!

29
00:01:08,569 --> 00:01:12,030
Maybe I'm someone who's ready for new experiences.

30
00:01:12,114 --> 00:01:15,033
Emily, who are you right now?

31
00:01:15,826 --> 00:01:18,328
I've been living in the grey area all my life.

32
00:01:19,329 --> 00:01:21,039
I didn't picture you embracing it.

33
00:01:21,123 --> 00:01:22,332
I'm trying.

34
00:01:24,418 --> 00:01:26,086
I thought I could move on from them,

35
00:01:26,169 --> 00:01:28,255
but they both mean so much for different reasons.

36
00:01:28,338 --> 00:01:29,631
Don't overthink it.

37
00:01:31,592 --> 00:01:33,510
I need boundaries.

38
00:01:33,594 --> 00:01:36,513
Did you really think she was going to move away from him?

39
00:01:46,148 --> 00:01:49,109
I promised myself I'd be open to any possibility.

40
00:01:55,198 --> 00:01:57,618
And this seems like it's the one.
